mapper.select: SELECT r.bno, r.cno, COUNT(*) AS count, COALESCE(b.nickname, c.nickname) AS nickname FROM report r LEFT JOIN board b ON r.bno = b.bno LEFT JOIN comment c ON r.cno = c.cno GROUP BY r.bno, r.cno HAVING count(*) > 2 limit #{start}, #{amount};
select reporter,reason from report where ${type} like #{no};
SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report r GROUP BY r.bno, r.cno HAVING count(*)>2) AS sub
